title: Comprehensive Aptitude Test - Mathematics, Logic & Technical

questions.question: If the price of a shirt is increased by 20%, by how much percent should its consumption be reduced so that the expenditure remains the same?
A machine doubles its efficiency every 2 hours. After 6 hours its output is 64 units. What was its output at the 2nd hour?
Five gears mesh in a straight line (each adjacent pair touches). If the first gear rotates clockwise, what is the rotation direction of the fifth gear?
One circuit charges in 2 hours. If three identical circuits are connected in parallel across the same charger, how long will it take to charge all three?
If the rule is "shift each letter forward by 1 in the alphabet" (A→B, B→C, …), how is ENGINEER encoded?
A bridge can hold a maximum load of exactly 10.000 tonnes. A truck weighing exactly 10.000 tonnes is crossing and is stopped halfway. A 1 kg bird lands on the truck. What happens (idealized)?
Four students stand in a row. A is taller than B but shorter than C. D is shorter than B. Who is the tallest?
Which 6-bit sequence has the longest continuous run of 1's?
A chemical tank doubles its volume every 3 minutes. If it becomes full at 60 minutes, when was it half full?
If √(x²) = -x, which is true?
If a resistor in a circuit doubles its resistance and applied voltage stays the same, the circuit current will:
A machine encodes text by shifting alternate letters: 1st letter +2, 2nd letter −1, 3rd +2, 4th −1, etc. What does LOGIC become?
Three identical bulbs: A and B are in series; that series branch is in parallel with bulb C. If bulb A burns out (open circuit), what happens to bulb C's brightness (ideal battery)?
How many 3-letter codewords (letters distinct) can be formed from A,B,C,D,E if the first letter cannot be A?
Pump A fills a tank in 6 hours; Pump B in 8 hours. Working together, how long will they take to fill the tank? (exact value)
A fair six-sided die is rolled twice. What is the probability that the sum is a prime number?
A pipeline has 5 equal-time stages (each time = t). A fault doubles the time of stage 3 (stage3 = 2t). By what percent does the total pipeline latency increase?
If ⌊log₂ n⌋ = 5 for a positive integer n, what is the possible range of n?
A 2 Ω resistor (R1) is in series with a parallel pair of 3 Ω (R2) and 6 Ω (R3). What is the equivalent resistance of the whole network?
A robot reports step counts as: 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, ... What is the next number?
The ratio of boys to girls in a class is 3:5. If there are 36 girls, how many boys are there in the class?
A shopkeeper sells an article at a profit of 20%. If the cost price is Rs. 250, what is the selling price?
A bag contains 4 red balls and 6 blue balls. Two balls are drawn at random. What is the probability that both balls are red?
If 12 workers can build a wall in 9 days, how many days will it take for 8 workers to build the same wall?
Which of the following are prime numbers? (i) 247, (ii) 397, (iii) 423
